meanings.definition: A communication sent electronically, typically consisting of text
meanings.sent1: I received a messaged from my friend on my phone.
meanings.sent2: The messaged I got from my teacher had all the homework details.
meanings.sent3: The messaged I sent to my cat asking for treats was silly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm messaged that brightened up my day.
meanings.sent5: The messaged about the party was so exciting, I couldn't wait to go!

meanings.definition: To send a message to someone
meanings.sent1: She messaged her friend to let them know about the change in plans.
meanings.sent2: I messaged my mom to ask if she needed anything from the store.
meanings.sent3: He messaged the dog to remind him it was time for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The music messaged to my soul and made me feel alive.
meanings.sent5: The wind messaged through the trees, creating a peaceful sound.
